name: CLASSIC RUN ATL BLACK TEE
description:
HOME OF THE ATLiens

In hip-hop, no matter who you are or what you do, you gotta show love to your home. Some say it ain't where you're from but where you're at. We say, one way or the other, stay true to your hood.

From the hoods of Collipark, East Point, and all the way down to Decatur, the ATL is a mecca of hip-hop. The new generation of Atlanta hip-hop are known as the inventors of Crunk and Snap music, but also that Trap muzik. But ATL is also the home of legends like Outkast, whose style is unlike no other. With artists like Ludacris, T.I., Young Jeezy and Lil' Jon paving the way for the newest generation of ATL hip-hop superstars, it's obvious ATL ain't going nowhere. 'I RUN ATL' t-shirt

100% Cotton, Medium Weight T-Shirt, Short Sleeve T-Shirt with Screen Printed Design, Pre-Shrunk to minimize shrinkage,   Machine Washable

And as an added bonus when you purchase the Classic Run Atl Tee you also receive a promotional copy of the C3 Mixtape featuring some of Atlanta's hottest major label & independant artists. 

This exclusive t-shirt & mixtape is a must have, sizes range from Medium-3XL so order yours fast while supplies last. 

Available in black.

(Style #00-CRATL-BLK)
